attributes.action: make endometriosis a disability and help people get treatment in a&e . its a serious condition
attributes.additional_details:
Endometriosis is a serious condition that effects so many women for most like myself it makes you seriously ill and unable to work . I am in constant chronic pain and pass out regularly. Some days my entire body goes numb. When going to a&e I was rejected as the doctor shrugged it off as period pain . We need more help.  I want to ask that more help and respect to be given a.d that it be classed as a disability. And the severe cases to be able to claim DLA.


If you have never had endometriosis you don't no what we deal with everyday. Each day is a fight. We need more help . Thank you
